context:
List of Virtual Console games for Nintendo 3DS (Japan)
Title | Publisher | Release Date | CERO
--- | --- | --- | ---
Zelda no Densetsu : Yume o Miru Shima DX | Nintendo | June 8 , 2011 | B
Trade & Battle : Card Hero | Nintendo | August 10 , 2011 | A
Balloon Fight GB | Nintendo | October 19 , 2011 | A
Metafight EX | Sunsoft | November 22 , 2011 | A
Wario Land 2 : Nusumareta Zaihō | Nintendo | April 4 , 2012 | A
Megami Tensei Gaiden : Last Bible | Atlus | April 25 , 2012 | A
Wario Land 3 : Fushigi na Orgel | Nintendo | May 2 , 2012 | A
Rayman : Mister Dark no Wana | Ubisoft | July 25 , 2012 | A
Megami Tensei Gaiden : Last Bible II | Atlus | September 12 , 2012 | A
Mario Golf GB | Nintendo | October 3 , 2012 | A
Zelda no Densetsu : Fushigi no Kinomi - Daichi no Shou | Nintendo | February 27 , 2013 | A
Zelda no Densetsu : Fushigi no Kinomi - Jikuu no Shou | Nintendo | February 27 , 2013 | A
Mario Tennis GB | Nintendo | June 26 , 2013 | A
Shin Megami Tensei : Devil Children - Aka no Shou | Atlus | November 13 , 2013 | A
Shin Megami Tensei : Devil Children - Kuro no Shou | Atlus | November 13 , 2013 | A
Rockman X : Cyber Mission | Capcom | December 4 , 2013 | A
Rockman X2 : Soul Eraser | Capcom | December 25 , 2013 | A
Donkey Kong GB : Dinky Kong & Dixie Kong | Nintendo | May 7 , 2014 | A
Pokémon Card GB | Nintendo | December 24 , 2014 | A
Pokémon Gold | Nintendo | September 22 , 2017 | A

wiki_section_title: Available titles -- Game Boy Color

wiki_section_text: There are 22 games available to purchase .

intro: The following is the complete list of the 291 Virtual Console titles that have been released for the Nintendo 3DS in Japan sorted by system and release dates. English translations are highlighted between parentheses.

qa.question: The last Capcom Virtual Console game for Nintendo 3DS in Japan , is a follow up to what game ?

nq_32299_31.Query Analysis: The query asks for the name of the game that is a follow-up to the last Capcom Virtual Console game released for the Nintendo 3DS in Japan.
nq_32299_31.Query Keywords Extraction: last, Capcom, Virtual Console, Nintendo 3DS, Japan, follow up, game
nq_32299_31.Answer Analysis: The answer is Mega Man Xtreme, indicating that the last Capcom Virtual Console game for Nintendo 3DS in Japan is a sequel to Mega Man Xtreme.
nq_32299_31.Document Content Analysis: The document discusses the release of _Super Mario Bros._ on various platforms, including the Virtual Console for Wii and Nintendo 3DS. It mentions the release dates and regions for these platforms but does not specifically discuss Capcom games or Mega Man Xtreme.
nq_32299_31.Document and Query Keywords Matching: The document mentions 'Virtual Console' and 'Nintendo 3DS', but does not mention 'Capcom', 'Japan', or 'follow up'.
nq_32299_31.Document and Answer Keywords Matching: The document does not mention 'Mega Man Xtreme' or any related terms.
nq_32299_31.Key Information Matching: The document provides information about Virtual Console releases but lacks specific details about Capcom games or the Nintendo 3DS lineup in Japan.
nq_32299_31.Can the Document Answer the Query: No, the document does not provide information about the last Capcom Virtual Console game for Nintendo 3DS in Japan or its predecessor.
nq_32299_31.Can the Document Help Infer Additional I: No, the document does not contain any relevant information that could help infer the answer to the query.
nq_32299_31.Explanation: The document is primarily about the release of _Super Mario Bros._ on various platforms and does not contain any information related to Capcom games, the Nintendo 3DS Virtual Console lineup in Japan, or Mega Man Xtreme. Therefore, it is irrelevant to the query.
